description:
I think you can easily detect a Minnesota or Wisconsin accent on Rich. He has German look to him, typical of that region. I always hate saying 33 years old is "mature" but it is nice to get a mature muscle dude in to the studio.
Rich is super friendly and while in Austin, he was really surprised by how friendly everyone one. His attitude really fit in, and after leaving sub-zero temps, he was really impressed with not only Southern weather, but southern attitude. He git right in!
Rich spends his free time naturally body-building, and is currently in a bulking phase for a show. He grew his pubes out for us a bit, and I love his natural body hair.
He was very nervous for the solo, but I think he enjoyed showing-off. His cum shot is very hot with a giant spurt catching some air!
title: Rich - Solo
